name: fernando luis rodrigues pereira
goal:
Oferecer um serviço de consultoría em comunicação, adequado aos objetivos das empresas e outros organismos, potenciando o contacto com as entidades europeias, para que se torne mais acessível uma melhor exposição e conhecimento das temáticas europeias.

to provide a communication consultancy service, adequate to the objectives of companies and other organizations, promoting contact with European entities, so that a better exposure and knowledge of the European themes becomes more accessible
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Audiovisual and Media, Budget, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
as associações empresariais, empresas e organismos da administração local estão no radar

business associations, companies and local government bodies are on the radar
